data.actual_result: User will be shown as their new username for everyone on the server, until people reload/refresh, at which point user will be shown again with their actual enforced nickname. Since users can change username twice per hour, they could constantly update it to keep appearing under a different nickname for everyone else online.
data.expected_result: For users with a nickname set to keep being shown as that user.
data.steps_to_repro: - Set a server with nickname permission disabled for all roles - Add a user to observe server - Add a user with the username RandomNick and nickname ThemedNick to server - Have the user change his username to ThemedNick. - Have the user change his username to BadWord. - From observer account, observe that user who changed their username to BadWord now appear as BadWord in the online list.
